snippet.title: Grove Island - Indie Horror Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Download Here: https://eightybit-games.itch.io/grove-island

Trapped on a small island, you are being stalked by multiple entities but you must keep your light sources alight while you try to search the island for anything useful...



- Keep your campfire lit, if both go out, who knows what may be bold enough to come for you.

- Search the Island to collect relics.

- Be wary of those who are watching from the shadows.



Hope you all enjoy EightyBit Games' first game! All feedback is welcome!
